isis.stitle: Electrical System Troubleshooting Guide - BE 200, CE 200, CE 300 Model - ELECTRONIC GAUGE CLUSTER - DIAGNOSTICS - LOSS OF DATA LINK

svcproc.title: LOSS OF DATA LINK
svcproc.para: If the EGC loses the connection with the data link, all gauges will sweep to zero and the check electrical system indicator will light.

If communication between the ESC and EGC is lost but the EGC is able to communicate with the engine controller, information from the engine controller will continue to be displayed. The check electrical system indicator will light.

If a communication between the EGC and the engine controller is lost but the EGC is able to communicate with the ESC, information from the ESC will continue to be displayed. The check electrical system indicator will light.
